title: Preview: After TCS and Infosys, will HCL Tech also disappoint Street in Q4? - Economic Times
content: Preview: After TCS and Infosys, will HCL Tech also disappoint Street in Q4?  Economic Times
description: The bearish projection comes at a time when earnings of TCS and Infosys have disappointed the Street. Both companies performed below par, and thus their stocks have seen some heavy selling in the last few days.
